verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw,<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> of him who <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> a <S%G975>book<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G2081>inside<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3693>outside,<s%> <S%G2696>sealed<s%> shut with <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4973>seals.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G2478>mighty<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2784>proclaiming<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> to <S%G455>open<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3089>break<s%> <S%G846>its<s%> <S%G4973>seals?<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> No <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3761>above,<s%> or <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3761>or<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> was <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G455>open<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> <S%G975>or<s%> to <S%G991>look<s%> in <S%G846>it.<s%>

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2799>wept<s%> <S%G4183>much,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> no <S%G3762>one<s%> was <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> to <S%G455>open<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G314><s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> <S%G3777>or<s%> to <S%G991>look<s%> in <S%G846>it.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1520>One<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G3361>"Don't<s%> <S%G2799>weep.<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G3023>Lion<s%> who <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G2448>Judah,<s%> the <S%G4491>Root<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> has <S%G3528>overcome;<s%> he who <S%G455>opens<s%> the <S%G975>book<s%> <S%G2532%G99999>and<s%> <S%G846>its<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4973>seals.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G2362>throne<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G5064>four<s%> living <S%G2226>creatures,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders,<s%> a <S%G721>Lamb<s%> <S%G2476>standing,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> though it had been <S%G4969>slain,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2768>horns,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4151>Spirits<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> sent <S%G649>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

<S%G2532>Then<s%> he <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G975>it<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> of him who <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne.<s%>

<S%G2532>Now<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he had <S%G2983>taken<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> living <S%G2226>creatures<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1501>twenty<s%> - <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> fell <S%G4098>down<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb,<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> one <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G2788>harp,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G5357>bowls<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G2368>incense,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G4335>prayers<s%> of the <S%G40>saints.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They <S%G103>sang<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G5603>song,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "You <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G455>open<s%> <S%G846>its<s%> <S%G4973>seals:<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> you were <S%G4969>killed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G59>bought<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5443>tribe,<s%> <S%G1100>language,<s%> <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1484>nation,<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> something like a <S%G5456>voice<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2943>around<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> the living <S%G2226>creatures,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4245>elders;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> ten <S%G3461>thousands<s%> of ten <S%G3461>thousands,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5505>thousands<s%> of <S%G5505>thousands;<s%>

<S%G3004>saying<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G514>"Worthy<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> who has been <S%G4969>killed<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G1411>power,<s%> <S%G4149>wealth,<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> <S%G2479>strength,<s%> <S%G5092>honor,<s%> <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2129>blessing!<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> created <S%G2938>thing<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739%G99999><s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>everything<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "To him who <S%G2521>sits<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> be the <S%G2129>blessing,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G5092>honor,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2904>dominion,<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever!<s%> Amen!"
